t: Amazon.com: Nature's Garden The Good Mountain Mix, 4.5 oz (Pack of 6) - Keto Friendly Snacks, BeHonest Keto Milk Chcolate Drops, Peanuts, Almonds, Cashews, Cranberries, Healthy Snacks for Adults, Mixed Nuts
s: This has a nice mix of flavors, textures, and seasoning. The nuts are salty which contrasts well with the sweetness of the milk chocolate pieces and the cranberries. The tartness of the cranberries adds depth to everything by offsetting the richness of the other flavors.

t: BeHonest and Nature’s Garden brand rollouts
s: December 10, 2019 - Cibo Vita is launching new products within its BeHonest and Nature’s Garden brands. New BeHonest introductions include Hazelnut Rondes and Hazelnut Truffles.

BeHonest Keto Milk Chocolate Drops Cibo Vita, manufacturer of the Nature’s Garden brand, is advancing its passion for healthy snacking with new BeHonest, an all-natural, low-carb, low-sugar, confectionery line designed to epitomise guilt-free ketogenic indulgences.

August 2, 2024 - Cibo Vita, manufacturer of the Nature’s Garden brand, has launched BeHonest, an all-natural, low-carb, low-sugar confectionary line.
